sqlMap.select: select USER_ID userId , BOARD_SEQ boardSeq , BOARD_TYPE boardType , BOARD_TITLE boardTitle , BOARD_CONTENT boardContent , BOARD_DATE boardDate , BOARD_SECRET boardSecret , BOARD_PW boardPw , BOARD_ANSWER boardAnswer , ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , BOARD_HITS boardHits , BOARD_DELETE boardDelete from TB_QNA_BOARD where BOARD_DELETE = 'N' AND USER_ID = #userId#

SELECT CODE code ,REPLY_SEQ replySeq ,USER_ID userId ,REPLY_DATE replyDate ,REPLY_CONTENT replyContent ,REPLY_DELETE replyDelete ,BOARD_SEQ boardSeq FROM TB_COMMENT WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #userId# AND REPLY_DELETE = 'N'

SELECT A.REST_CODE restCode , (select B.REST_NAME from TB_REST_INFO B where B.REST_CODE = A.REST_CODE) restName , A.USER_ID userId , A.BOARD_DATE boardDate , A.BOARD_CONTENT boardContent FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARD_DELETE='N' AND A.USER_ID= #userId#
